concept.title: Install Additional Libraries Using the Package Manager

conbody.p: core tarball installinstalling additional librariesPackage Managerinstalling additional librariesYou can use the Package Manager within to install additional tarball libraries to use stages that are not included in the core installation. This is an optional step, but generally you'll want to install additional libraries to process data.
conbody.note: You must perform additional steps to install the MapR or Apache Solr stage libraries. For more information, see or .
conbody.p: Click the Package Manager icon to display the Package Manager. The Package Manager lists all available stage libraries, displaying a checkbox next to each one installed in the . You can filter the stage libraries by type or you can search for a stage library in the list.
For information about the stages installed with each stage library, see .

To install an additional stage library, click the More icon for the library, and then click Install. Or to install multiple stage libraries, select the libraries in the list and then click the Install icon . Confirm that you want to install the libraries, and then restart Data Collector for the changes to take effect.

To uninstall a stage library, click the More icon for the library, and then click Uninstall. Or to uninstall multiple stage libraries, select the libraries in the list and then click the Uninstall icon . Confirm that you want to uninstall the libraries, and then restart Data Collector for the changes to take effect.
